title: Let's talk about this Vayne issue.
body: There is none. She has not had ANY major changes since 1.x patch and now all of a sudden everyone thinks she is OP. She is not OP, other adc's are undertuned. Lucian and caitlyn need buffs, vayne DOES NOT need a nerf. Vayne is a duelist. You duel her 1v1 you're gonna die, don't cry that she's OP. Her range makes her VERY easy to vaynespot in teamfights. If your team isn't smart enough to focus the vayne over anyone else, then you deserve to get a truedmg silver bolt up your rear.

I'm not sure if I agree.

There has always been circle jerking for Vayne, but its only become even more prominent the past month or so for four reasons:

One, most of ADC which are used have been nerfed to an extent, indirect buff to her as it allows for her to be stronger.

She thrives well in metas where champions have a lot of hp, taking into consideration the juggernauts update and the cinderhulk, she does well against them.

Buff to BORK - Buff to Vayne

Nerfs to her item counters - Buff for Vayne.

While yes, Vayne has seen no changes in  awhile, she's coming off stronger now because everything that was strong against her was nerf, and a core item for her was made stronger as well. 

Either changes need to be made to BORK, or Vayne needs some number tuning, her numbers were fine 6 months ago, they're not ok now because of the way the game has changed around her.

As has been pointed out, it isn't Vayne herself but rather:

1) BoRK buffed, buff to Vayne.
2) Omen punishes heavy crit builders, buff to Vayne.
3) Frozen Heart's IAS nerf aura down, buff to Vayne.
4) Thirster remade, IE nerfed, buff to Vayne.
5) Lucian and Cait nerf (both direct and indirect), buff to Vayne.
6) Several targeted CCs removed from the game, buff to Vayne.
7) Nearly all invis reveal effects removed from various kits (like Corki), buff to Vayne.

The only real strong Vayne counter left in the game right now is Varus, but no one plays him.

Give Cait, MF, Graves, and Lucian some buffs, improve Thirster and IE, put invisibility reveal back onto Koggy's R and Corki's Q.  That should expand the range counters available to hold Vayne down.

>Vayne DOES NOT need a nerf
